column6: Ben Urich and Sally Floyd, now running their own newspaper, attempt to single-handedly cover a story that even the big boys can't! Plus, detective Danny Granville and the alien known as Korg race to figure out who killed one of Hulk's allies!
column8: | penciller:Ramon Bachs | penciller:Shawn Martinbrough | penciller:Chris Moreno | writer:Paul Jenkins | penciller (cover):John Watson
